A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was the most poorly written and thought-out movie I have seen in a long time.  Disney succeeded in the biggest \"dropping the ball\" moment in movie-making history\, congrats.  Terrible\, illogical character arcs (if you even want to call them that)\, hugely gaping plot holes that make no sense\, very little story and character progression\, and if it matters to you\, a senseless re-write of the SW universe \"rules\" and characters...very irreverent to SW. I rank this the 12th worst Star Wars movie\, behind the The Star Wars Holiday Special and The Ewoks Adventure.
